languages.text: "Все выжившие — тут, при этой штольне. Остальные мертвы. Или хуже, чем мертвы — в лапах чудовищ из Комморры. Последний астропат погиб, когда в его разум вторглась варп-сущность, выследившая его по пси-следу. Остальные облагодетельствованы защитой тех сил, что я призвала на помощь".

"All of the survivors are here in this tunnel. The rest are dead. Or worse than dead — they are in the clutches of the monsters from Commorragh. Our last Astropath died when his mind was invaded by a warp entity — it used his psy-trail to hunt him down. The rest of the people here have been blessed with the protection of those forces that I summoned to our aid."
languages.original_text: "Все выжившие — тут, при этой штольне. Остальные мертвы. Или хуже, чем мертвы — в лапах чудовищ из Комморры. Последний астропат погиб, когда в его разум вторглась варп-сущность, выследившая его по пси-следу. Остальные облагодетельствованы защитой тех сил, что я призвала на помощь".

The rest of the people here have been blessed with the protection of those forces that I summoned to our aid."

Our last Astropath died when his mind was invaded by a warp entity — it used his psy-trail to hunt him down. The rest of the people here have been blessed with the protection of those forces that I summoned to our aid."
traits.speaker: QuarryWorld_Emelina

languages.text: “所有幸存者都躲在这条隧道里，剩下的人都死了。或者说，他们落入了科摩罗的那些怪物的魔掌中，落得了比死还要凄惨的下场。我们最后一位星语者的意识被来自亚空间的怪物入侵。那只怪物循着它的灵能轨迹，杀害了他。这里存活下来的人，目前正在被我召唤来的力量保护着。”
languages.original_text: "All of the survivors are here in this tunnel. The rest are dead. Or worse than dead — they are in the clutches of the monsters from Commorragh. Our last Astropath died when his mind was invaded by a warp entity — it used his psy-trail to hunt him down. The rest of the people here have been blessed with the protection of those forces that I summoned to our aid."

traits.locale_text: “所有幸存者都躲在这条隧道里，剩下的人都死了。或者说，他们落入了科摩罗的那些怪物的魔掌中，落得了比死还要凄惨的下场。我们最后一位星语者的意识被来自亚空间的怪物入侵。那只怪物循着它的灵能轨迹，杀害了他。这里存活下来的人，目前正在被我召唤来的力量保护着。”
traits.speaker: QuarryWorld_Emelina

languages.text: «Todos los supervivientes se encuentran en este túnel. Los demás han muerto. O peor: están en las garras de los monstruos de Commorragh. Nuestro último astrópata murió cuando una entidad de la disformidad invadió su mente; siguió su rastro psíquico para darle caza. El resto de esta gente cuenta con la protección bendita de las fuerzas que invoqué en nuestra ayuda».
languages.original_text: "All of the survivors are here in this tunnel. The rest are dead. Or worse than dead — they are in the clutches of the monsters from Commorragh. Our last Astropath died when his mind was invaded by a warp entity — it used his psy-trail to hunt him down. The rest of the people here have been blessed with the protection of those forces that I summoned to our aid."

traits.locale_text: «Todos los supervivientes se encuentran en este túnel. Los demás han muerto. O peor: están en las garras de los monstruos de Commorragh. Nuestro último astrópata murió cuando una entidad de la disformidad invadió su mente; siguió su rastro psíquico para darle caza. El resto de esta gente cuenta con la protección bendita de las fuerzas que invoqué en nuestra ayuda».
traits.speaker: QuarryWorld_Emelina

languages.text: 「生存者は全員このトンネルにいます。残りは死んでいました。または、死んでいるよりひどい状態です。彼らはコモラフの怪物の手中にあります。私たちの最後の感応通信官は、歪みの実体によって心が侵されて亡くなりました。歪みの実体は彼の精神トレイルを利用して追跡したのです。ここにいる残りの人々は、私が救援のために招集した軍隊の保護が得られているだけ恵まれています」
languages.original_text: "All of the survivors are here in this tunnel. The rest are dead. Or worse than dead — they are in the clutches of the monsters from Commorragh. Our last Astropath died when his mind was invaded by a warp entity — it used his psy-trail to hunt him down. The rest of the people here have been blessed with the protection of those forces that I summoned to our aid."

traits.locale_text: 「生存者は全員このトンネルにいます。残りは死んでいました。または、死んでいるよりひどい状態です。彼らはコモラフの怪物の手中にあります。私たちの最後の感応通信官は、歪みの実体によって心が侵されて亡くなりました。歪みの実体は彼の精神トレイルを利用して追跡したのです。ここにいる残りの人々は、私が救援のために招集した軍隊の保護が得られているだけ恵まれています」
traits.speaker: QuarryWorld_Emelina

languages.text: « Tous les survivants se trouvent ici, dans ce tunnel. Les autres sont morts, ou pire encore : entre les griffes des monstres de Commorragh. Notre dernier astropathe a péri lorsqu'une entité du Warp a pénétré dans son esprit en se servant de sa psy-empreinte pour le traquer. Les gens qui sont ici bénéficient de la protection des forces que j'ai conjurées pour nous venir en aide. »
languages.original_text: "All of the survivors are here in this tunnel. The rest are dead. Or worse than dead — they are in the clutches of the monsters from Commorragh. Our last Astropath died when his mind was invaded by a warp entity — it used his psy-trail to hunt him down. The rest of the people here have been blessed with the protection of those forces that I summoned to our aid."

traits.locale_text: « Tous les survivants se trouvent ici, dans ce tunnel. Les autres sont morts, ou pire encore : entre les griffes des monstres de Commorragh. Notre dernier astropathe a péri lorsqu'une entité du Warp a pénétré dans son esprit en se servant de sa psy-empreinte pour le traquer. Les gens qui sont ici bénéficient de la protection des forces que j'ai conjurées pour nous venir en aide. »
traits.speaker: QuarryWorld_Emelina

languages.text: "Alle Überlebenden befinden sich hier in diesem Tunnel. Die übrigen sind tot. Oder schlimmer als tot – sie sind in den Klauen der Monster aus Commorragh. Unser letzter Astropath starb, als eine Warp-Wesenheit seinen Geist übernahm – sie brachte ihn anhand seiner Psi-Spur zur Strecke. Der Rest der Menschen hier wurde mit dem Schutz gesegnet, dessen Mächte ich zu unserer Unterstützung gerufen habe."
languages.original_text: "All of the survivors are here in this tunnel. The rest are dead. Or worse than dead — they are in the clutches of the monsters from Commorragh. Our last Astropath died when his mind was invaded by a warp entity — it used his psy-trail to hunt him down. The rest of the people here have been blessed with the protection of those forces that I summoned to our aid."

traits.locale_text: "Alle Überlebenden befinden sich hier in diesem Tunnel. Die übrigen sind tot. Oder schlimmer als tot – sie sind in den Klauen der Monster aus Commorragh. Unser letzter Astropath starb, als eine Warp-Wesenheit seinen Geist übernahm – sie brachte ihn anhand seiner Psi-Spur zur Strecke. Der Rest der Menschen hier wurde mit dem Schutz gesegnet, dessen Mächte ich zu unserer Unterstützung gerufen habe."
traits.speaker: QuarryWorld_Emelina

languages.text: "Hayatta kalan herkes bu tünelde. Gerisi öldü. Ya başlarına ölümden daha kötüsü geldi ya da Commorragh'tan gelen canavarların pençelerine düştüler. Son Astropatımız; ruhseziye başvurarak kendisini avlayan, zihni bir öteboyut varlığınca istila edilerek can verdi. Kalan insanlar, yardımımıza çağırdığım güçlerin korumasıyla kutsanmış durumda."
languages.original_text: "All of the survivors are here in this tunnel. The rest are dead. Or worse than dead — they are in the clutches of the monsters from Commorragh. Our last Astropath died when his mind was invaded by a warp entity — it used his psy-trail to hunt him down. The rest of the people here have been blessed with the protection of those forces that I summoned to our aid."

traits.locale_text: "Hayatta kalan herkes bu tünelde. Gerisi öldü. Başlarına ölümden daha kötüsü geldi ya da, Commorragh'tan gelen canavarların pençelerine düştüler. Son Astropatımız, zihni bir öteboyut varlığınca istila edilerek öldü. Onu avlamak için ruhsezisini kullanmış. Kalan insanlar, yardımımıza çağırdığım güçlerin korumasıyla kutsanmış durumdalar."
traits.speaker: QuarryWorld_Emelina
